channel.title: Market on un01s notes
channel.description: Recent content in Market on un01s notes

item.title: market watch 2026
item.description:
Theodosius Dobzhansky: Nothing in biology makes sense except in the light of evolution.

2026-01-30: gold fell 8% to below $5K from $5595. silver down 17% to $95. bitcoin down to $83K

  • Jan 31: Bitcoin fell to $80K. Then about $77K @ 0828PM UTC Jan31,2026, gold $4902 at London. Gold-future April around $4K7.

2026-01-23: Gold-$4949, Sliver above $100 for the first time

In the late afternoon, gold future rises above $5K for the first time. what an uncertain world!

item.title: notes
item.description:
Two mini-stories:

water-bottle

In a library. Put my water bottle on the foutain stand and went into the restroom. Upon returning, my water bottle was gone. While I have left it this way many many times, the water bottle always stays there without leaving. Where is it?

I went outside and saw a man leaving. Ran to him and saw my water bottle in his hand. “Excuse me, that water bottle is mine.” “Oh, I thought somebody lost it.”
